verses.verse: An oracle. <S%H4853><s%> The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is against the land <S%H776><s%> of Hadrach, <S%H2317><s%> and will rest <S%H4496><s%> upon Damascus; <S%H1834><s%> for the eye <S%H5869><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> and of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is toward Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%>
and Hamath, <S%H2574><s%> also, <S%H1379><s%> which borders on it; <S%H6865><s%> Tyre and Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> because they are very <S%H3966><s%> wise. <S%H2449><s%>

Tyre <S%H6865><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> herself a stronghold, <S%H4692><s%> and heaped up <S%H6651><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> like the dust, <S%H6083><s%> and fine gold <S%H2742><s%> like the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets. <S%H2351><s%>

Behold, <S%H136><s%> the Lord will dispossess <S%H3423><s%> her, <S%H5221><s%> and he will strike her power <S%H2428><s%> in the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and she will be devoured <S%H398><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3372><s%> and fear; Gaza <S%H5804><s%> also, <S%H3966><s%> and will writhe in agony; <S%H2342><s%> as will Ekron, <S%H6138><s%> for her expectation <S%H4007><s%> will be disappointed; <S%H3001><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> will perish <S%H6><s%> from Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> will not be inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>
Foreigners <S%H4464><s%> will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

I will take away <S%H5493><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> out of his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and his abominations <S%H8251><s%> from between his teeth; <S%H8127><s%> and he also will be a remnant <S%H7604><s%> for our God; <S%H430><s%> and he will be as a chieftain <S%H441><s%> in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> as a Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

I will encamp <S%H2583><s%> around my house <S%H1004><s%> against the army, <S%H4675><s%> that none pass through <S%H5674><s%> or return; <S%H7725><s%> and no oppressor <S%H5065><s%> will pass through <S%H5674><s%> them any more: <S%H7200><s%> for now I have seen with my eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Rejoice <S%H1523><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> Shout, <S%H7321><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jerusalem! <S%H3389><s%> Behold, <S%H4428><s%> your King comes <S%H935><s%> to you! <S%H6662><s%> He is righteous, and having salvation; <S%H3467><s%> lowly, <S%H6041><s%> and riding <S%H7392><s%> on a donkey, <S%H2543><s%> even on a colt, <S%H5895><s%> the foal <S%H1121><s%> of a donkey. <S%H860><s%>

I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> from Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and the horse <S%H5483><s%> from Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%> will be cut off; <S%H3772><s%> and he will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the nations: <S%H1471><s%> and his dominion <S%H4915><s%> will be from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea, <S%H3220><s%> and from the River <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

As for you also, <S%H1818><s%> because of the blood of your covenant, <S%H1285><s%> I have set free <S%H7971><s%> your prisoners <S%H615><s%> from the pit <S%H953><s%> in which is no water. <S%H4325><s%>

Turn <S%H7725><s%> to the stronghold, <S%H1225><s%> you prisoners <S%H615><s%> of hope! <S%H8615><s%> Even today <S%H3117><s%> I declare <S%H5046><s%> that I will restore <S%H7725><s%> double to you. <S%H4932><s%>

For indeed I bend Judah <S%H3063><s%> as a bow <S%H7198><s%> for me. <S%H4390><s%> I have filled the bow <S%H7198><s%> with Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and I will stir up <S%H5782><s%> your sons, <S%H1121><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> against your sons, <S%H1121><s%> Greece, <S%H3120><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> you like the sword <S%H2719><s%> of a mighty man. <S%H1368><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be seen <S%H7200><s%> over them; <S%H2671><s%> and his arrow will go flash <S%H3318><s%> like lightning; <S%H1300><s%> and the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> will blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and will go <S%H1980><s%> with whirlwinds <S%H5591><s%> of the south. <S%H8486><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> will defend <S%H1598><s%> them; <S%H398><s%> and they will destroy and overcome <S%H3533><s%> with sling <S%H7050><s%> stones; <S%H68><s%> and they will drink, <S%H8354><s%> and roar <S%H1993><s%> as through wine; <S%H3196><s%> and they will be filled <S%H4390><s%> like bowls, <S%H4219><s%> like the corners <S%H2106><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> will save <S%H3467><s%> them in that day <S%H3117><s%> as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of his people; <S%H5971><s%> for they are like the jewels <S%H68><s%> of a crown, <S%H5145><s%> lifted on high <S%H5264><s%> over his land. <S%H127><s%>

For how great is his goodness, <S%H2898><s%> and how great is his beauty! <S%H3308><s%> Grain <S%H1715><s%> will make the young men <S%H970><s%> flourish, <S%H5107><s%> and new wine <S%H8492><s%> the virgins. <S%H1330><s%>
